name: Hydro Flask Lunch Tote
description: Lunch is an important part of your day. This fully insulated tote keeps your food cool and ready for your lunch break. The fully lined interior wipes down in case of leaks.Coated fabric is durable and waterproof.Lightweight insulation keeps lunch cool for up to 4 hours.Lined interior cleans up easily.External zippered pocket holds utensils or dry snacks.Flexible handle for comfortable carrying.
